addBookmarkBottom.message: Bookmark Current Tab To Bottom Of This

addBookmarkTop.message: Bookmark Current Tab To Top Of This

confirmDeleteFolderBookmarks.message: Are you sure you want to delete $folderName$ folder and $bookmarkCount$ bookmark(s) init?

confirmDeleteFolderSubfolders.message: Are you sure you want to delete $folderName$ folder and $subFolderCount$ sub-folder(s) init?

confirmDeleteFolderSubfoldersBookmarks.message: Are you sure you want to delete $folderName$ folder, $subFolderCount$ sub-folder(s) and $bookmarkCount$ bookmark(s) init?

confirmOpenBookmarks.description: Confirmation message for opening all bookmarks.
confirmOpenBookmarks.message: Are you sure you want to open all $count$ bookmarks?

confirmOpenBookmarksNewIncognitoWindow.description: Confirmation message for opening all bookmarks in a new incognito window.
confirmOpenBookmarksNewIncognitoWindow.message: Are you sure you want to open all $count$ bookmarks in a new incognito window?

confirmOpenBookmarksNewWindow.description: Confirmation message for opening all bookmarks in a new window.
confirmOpenBookmarksNewWindow.message: Are you sure you want to open all $count$ bookmarks in a new window?

copyAllTitlesAndUrls.message: Copy all titles and URLs to clipboard

copyTitleAndUrl.message: Copy title and URL to clipboard

customIconDescription.message: The icon has to be in 19*19 pixel dimension. Else it'll be resized to this dimension.

customSeparatorTitleDescription.message: The real title of bookmark which is shown as a separator

customSeparatorUrlDescription.message: The real URL of bookmark which is shown as a separator

customSeparatorStringDescription.message: If URL of a bookmark contains this string, it will be shown as a separator

customStylesDescription.message: This requires some CSS skillz. Hack at your own risk. Code sharing would be wise done via

extDesc.message: A popup bookmark manager. Enhanced Neat Bookmarks.

noTitle.description: The title for untitled bookmarks with no http(s) URL or untitled folders.

openBookmarksIncognitoWindow.message: Open All Bookmarks in Incognito Window

openBookmarksNewWindow.message: Open All Bookmarks in New Window

optionClickNewTab.message: Left-click opens bookmark in new tab.

optionCloseUnusedFolders.message: Close unused folders when opening a folder.

optionConfirmOpenFolder.message: Display confirmation when opening a lot of bookmarks from a folder.

optionOnlyShowBookmarkBar.message: Only show bookmarks in Bookmark Bar

optionOpenNewTab.message: Middle-click or control-click opens bookmark in new background tab(in stead of foreground).

optionPopupStays.message: Popup stays open when opening(left-clicking) bookmarks.

optionRememberPrevState.message: Remember previous state(scroll position and opened folders).

optionsFooterText.description: Footer text for the Options page

parentFolder.description: Parent folder in formation displayed in the tooltip of bookmarks in search results list.

reportedToDeveloper.description: A message for an error occured in the extension, has been reported to the developer.
reportedToDeveloper.message: This has been reported to the developer.
